channel.title: Help Me With This Server Problem
channel.description: Okay I need help with my compiler and i just downloaded jdk 6 update 13 how do I create a compiler for this i went to control panels > Java > View version of java control panel. Then it was 1.6.0_13 and i need help with this compiler can someone help me with this problem I have

item.title: Help Me With This Server Problem
item.dc:creator: @shockys shockys
item.description:
@shockys wrote:

right click on combile.bat > edit > delete everything in their > paste this code.

@echo off COLOR 09 title shockys V1 Compiler, Created By shockys echo::::::::::::::::::::::: echo::Server Compiling...:: echo::::::::::::::::::::::: javac *.java Color 2 echo:::::::::::::::::::: echo::Server Compiled!:: echo:::::::::::::::::::: pause
then save it, have fun.

Read full topic
item.source: Help Me With This Server Problem

item.title: Help Me With This Server Problem
item.dc:creator: @barelypassing barelypassing
item.description:
@barelypassing wrote:

@echo off
title Shadow 53124 Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause

If your program files are in D: like mine change the directory.
Save that in a text file though, and name it compile.bat and use it.

Read full topic
item.source: Help Me With This Server Problem
